this is the first instant of a rhino getting out at the omaha zoo. the staff does practice for these types of drills. they plan to go back through and critique the plan.
the rhino was in a secluded area, trying to eat grass. he knew the door hadn't been locked properly, and was able to escape. the zoo is now considering fencing this area.
the rhino was out there wandering alone, the zoo staff is now thinking about fencing off the area even more.
no one was harmed, no visitors or other animals. the rhino strolled around a back area of the zoo to eat some grass and was eventually coaxed back into his enclosure.
